emergency_responses.suicide:
ðŸš¨ EMERGENCY WARNING: If you're having thoughts of harming yourself, please reach out for help IMMEDIATELY. Your life has immense value and help is available 24/7.

ðŸ“ž CONTACT NOW:
â€¢ 119 (National Hotline - 24/7)
â€¢ 0804-1-500-454 (Yayasan Pulih)
â€¢ 0811-976-9995 (SEJIWA - 24/7)

You are NOT alone in this struggle. Many people care and are ready to help. Please don't give up.
emergency_responses.menyakiti_diri:
ðŸš¨ PERINGATAN: Saya sangat khawatir dengan Anda. Jika Anda memiliki keinginan untuk menyakiti diri sendiri, tolong segera cari bantuan profesional.

ðŸ“ž Hubungi:
â€¢ 119 (Darurat Nasional)
â€¢ 0804-1-500-454 (Yayasan Pulih)
â€¢ 0811-976-9995 (SEJIWA)

Anda tidak sendirian dan bantuan tersedia. Hidup Anda berharga.
emergency_responses.self_harm:
ðŸš¨ WARNING: I'm very concerned about you. If you have urges to harm yourself, please seek professional help immediately.

â€¢ 119 (National Emergency)

emergency_responses.krisis:

emergency_responses.emergency:
